txt.en: You have encountered an Orc of the Sutcrofts. Fastred would be greatly pleased if more of their kind were purged from the Sutcrofts.
'Fastred is more than willing to part with a bounty for your services on the field.\n\n'Your efforts against the Orcs will not be forgotten.'

The Orcs of the Sutcrofts have too long been encroaching ever-closer to Snowbourn. Fastred's fervour is not misplaced, though a bit extreme - the less Orcs the Rohirrim have to contend with, the better.
Fastred has decreed that no Orc is to find shelter in the Sutcrofts and all must be slain.\n\nOrcs can be found throughout the Sutcrofts, especially near Snowbourn.
Cynelac is outside the mead-hall of Snowbourn.
